name: ddns-updater-cf
short_desc: Container to update DNS records periodically with WebUI for many DNS providers,
author: Quentin McGaw
description: Program to keep DNS A and/or AAAA records updated for multiple DNS providers.

form_fields.label: Resolver Address
form_fields.hint: A plaintext DNS address to use to resolve your domain names defined in your settings only.

form_fields.label: Pushover API Token
form_fields.hint: The API Token is displayed at the top of the application page.

form_fields.label: Pushover User Key
form_fields.hint: At your Pushover dashboard you can view your User Key in the top right.

form_fields.label: Pushover Devices
form_fields.hint: Comma separated list of Pushover Devices

form_fields.label: Domain
form_fields.hint: It can be example.com, sub.example.com or *.example.com.

form_fields.label: TTL
form_fields.hint: integer value for record TTL in seconds (specify 1 for automatic)

form_fields.label: Token
form_fields.hint: API Token, configured with DNS edit permissions for your DNS name's zone.

form_fields.label: IP Version
form_fields.hint: can be ipv4 (A records), or ipv6 (AAAA records) or ipv4 or ipv6 (update one of the two, depending on the public ip found). It defaults to ipv4 or ipv6.

form_fields.label: IPv6 Suffix
form_fields.hint: IPv6 interface identifier suffix to use. If left empty, it defaults to no suffix and the raw public IPv6 address obtained is used in the record updating.
